troparion: (Tone 3) If You count our sins, O Lord and Lover of Mankind,* what is our hope of salvation?* But, send Your help from heaven *upon Your people, O Lord of goodness.
prokimenon: O God, save me by Your name;
by your power, uphold my cause
O God, hear my prayer; listen to the words of my mouth.
second_prokimenon: O God, listen to my prayer,
do not hide from my pleading.
